name: Road to Morrow
description:
Road to Morrow is a narrative-driven puzzle adventure game set in a near future Europe devastated by the effects of climate change. Explore this new normal through Iris, a girl whose memory was erased by an unknown event and must survive working for a company that controls everything.

Travel around different countries created in a unique art style that bring together 2D and 3D graphics. Complete your tasks and reveal all the secrets of a world which is closer that you think...

STORYLINE

What if your best friend was an Artificial intelligence?

Followed by WILL, her virtual assistant, Iris rides the flooded streets of Amsterdam on her motorcycle, working for the mighty Nozomi, the company that controls everything in a dystopian world threatened by the climate change. After having her memory erased by an unknown event, she survives being rejected by society until some mysterious photographs she finds while traveling across Europe cause her way of understanding the world to change completely.

WHAT'S IN THIS DEMO?

  • PROLOGUE & FIRST CHAPTER
  • ASTONISHING ARTSTYLE
  • SIX UNIQUE LOCATIONS
  • ENGLISH/SPANISH TRANSLATION
  • And a little surprise if you finish...

CONTROLS

Point-and-click. Full-mouse experience!
